thread.title: Mayawati flays BJP for Faridabad killings
thread.title_full: Mayawati flays BJP for Faridabad killings - The Times of India

author: Pankaj Shah
title: Mayawati flays BJP for Faridabad killings
text:
LUCKNOW: BSP chief Mayawati on Friday launched a blistering attack on the BJP, holding the party responsible for the Faridabad incident in which two Dalit children were burnt alive.
Addressing reporters in Lucknow, Mayawati said Dalits were targeted in BJP-ruled states. She said powerful people belonging to higher castes killed the Dalit children in Faridabad. She also added that the children were burnt alive in presence of the police.
The BSP president also said that Congress scion Rahul Gandhi's visit was only a show-off vis-a-vis the Faridabad incident. She called it an attempt to gain political mileage.
Mayawati also demanded the resignation of Gen. VK Singh for his alleged "dog" remark in connection with the Faridabad incident. Dalits are also being targeted in UP, she added.
